scripts.test: base64 testPayload.json > encodedTestPayload && aws lambda invoke --function-name wasArticleSeenBefore --payload file://encodedTestPayload --no-cli-auto-prompt  testResults && cat testResults | cut -c -500
scripts.upload: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --no-cli-auto-prompt --function-name wasArticleSeenBefore --zip-file fileb://dist/index.zip && sleep 10s && npm test
